CustomField.description: Display option for setting a question on either a new row or next to previous question. That is either single column layout or two column layout.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the desired question layout for the survey response interface: Single Row: Displays each question on its own row, occupying the full width of the response interface. Side-by-Side: Positions two consecutive questions side by side, allowing participants to view and respond to them simultaneously. Please note that for the best user experience, certain layout options may be automatically overridden when participants take the survey on a tablet or mobile device.
CustomField.label: Question Layout
